about_the_game:
Graffiti Cozy - open-world 3D-platformer about graffiti and urban culture with smooth toy-like vibes and bouncy hip-hop sound.


You are Cozy - duck and street artist at same time. You must explore tiny city of Neo-Armavir for graffiti spots to prove your graffiti skills.



To move around the city you use a jetpack that needs to be upgraded to get to hard-to-reach places.



You can find some strange citizens who have some strange quests for you but you never know in advance what might be useful in the future. And run away from anti-vandal soldiers !

Features:

  • Explore tiny handcrafted open-world full of strange creatures and hidden gems waiting to be explored.
  • There is no pressure's agendas - just only you, city and graffiti. So play game at your own tempo.
  • Find some strange citizens who have some strange quests for you.
  • Run away from anti-vandal soldiers ! They don't want to help you with graffiti.
  • Toy aesthetics in the softness of which you can just chill out.
  • Listen to bouncy soundtrack from true hip-hop platinum producer SEEYAY.
detailed_description:
Graffiti Cozy - open-world 3D-platformer about graffiti and urban culture with smooth toy-like vibes and bouncy hip-hop sound.


You are Cozy - duck and street artist at same time. You must explore tiny city of Neo-Armavir for graffiti spots to prove your graffiti skills.



To move around the city you use a jetpack that needs to be upgraded to get to hard-to-reach places.



You can find some strange citizens who have some strange quests for you but you never know in advance what might be useful in the future. And run away from anti-vandal soldiers !

Features:

  • Explore tiny handcrafted open-world full of strange creatures and hidden gems waiting to be explored.
  • There is no pressure's agendas - just only you, city and graffiti. So play game at your own tempo.
  • Find some strange citizens who have some strange quests for you.
  • Run away from anti-vandal soldiers ! They don't want to help you with graffiti.
  • Toy aesthetics in the softness of which you can just chill out.
  • Listen to bouncy soundtrack from true hip-hop platinum producer SEEYAY.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core at 2 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Graffiti Cozy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (2 * 3100) or equivalent or AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Graffiti Cozy - open-world 3D-platformer where you can explore city with jetpack, bomb graffiti spots and chill out with bouncy hip-hop soundtrack - and all of that at toy-like smooth vibes.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Danish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese
